page.title: 01THE MAYOR
page.content: The Mayor is a very important person in the Borough. He has his own house, and he has a Parlour in the Civic Centre. He wears a black three-cornered hat, a red jacket with gold edgings, black trousers and a gold chain of office around his neck. The Mayor's chauffeur lives in Iris Avenue near my school. The Mayor has many cars and one of them is a six-seater Ford Granada with back seats facing each other. The Mayor's Secretary deals with all the dates for him to visit places. He also arranges annual events such as opening special things like homes for the dis-abled, new roads and housing estates. There is a new mayor every year elected from the Councillors. The Mayor sometimes visits our school.
